detail: Every year new tech giants are born.
You get to choose who we fund.
You are a shareholder from inception.

WHY.content: enabling the community to partially own it's own tech giants.
detail1: YOU OWN A PERCENTAGE FOR LIFE
WHY.detail21: A unicorn is a privately held startup company valued at over $1billion. We invest 60% of all NFT's' sold into a potential startup as per votes from our shareholders and NFT owners. We support, mentor and grow the startup until it is a Unicorn.
WHY.detail22: What do you get when buying a Rainbow Unicorn?
detail23: Shares in the Startup we fund.

HOW.content: Each phase entitles the NFT owner to new perks and participation rights.

detail: EACH UNICORN HAS A MINIMUM OF 9 AND A MAXIMUM OF 10 TRAITS.
THE UNICORN VERSION INDICATES THE STARTUP ASSOCIATED WITH IT.
YOUR UNICORN GRANTS YOU ACCESS TO OUR BUSINESS PORTAL.
